articles.title: Top 10 SUVs In February 2022- Nexon, Creta, Punch, Brezza, Thar & More - GaadiWaadi.com
articles.description: Tata Nexon topped the SUV sales chart in February 2022, with Hyundai Venue and Creta following behind, in that order
articles.content: In February 2022, Tata Nexon once again became the best-selling SUV in the Indian market, with a total of 12,259 units sold. This was a sales growth of 54.6 per cent on a Year-on-Year (YoY) basis, wi… [+2370 chars]

articles.title: TCS to play key role in overhauling Tata group-owned Air India - Economic Times
articles.description: Tata Sons chairman N Chandrasekaran and TCS chief executive Rajesh Gopinathan are personally involved in analysing Air Indias cost optimization and tech-led transformation needs, the sources, who are aware of the discussions, said.
